content: our new neighborly cardigan is an homage to our favorite neighbor whether you want to knit it for yourself or your favorite neighbor the wearer is sure to appreciate the coziness of the touch of alpaca bonus bundles you ll use to work it up it s a level 2 easy beginner + pattern but looks much more impressive with the cables and neat ribbing at the waist since it s such a fitted look you ll want to be sure to inspect the sizing options and corresponding measurements in the pattern before choosing your appropriate size & ordering accordingly sizes s m l 1x 2x finished chest about 42 45 49 52 56 in 106 5 114 5 124 5 132 142 cm finished length about 27½ 28 28½ 29 29½ in 70 71 72 5 73 5 75 we hope this new pattern will delight crafters with fond memories of magic_ring rogers or maybe even inspire someone to try their first sweater nobody would be prouder than magic_ring rogers who s been encouraging us to do our best since 1963 and here at lion brand we re with you every step of the way so be sure to let us know if you re casting this on
